pages.text: The $(mob)Yuki-Onna$() is a neutral monster that spawns in Taigas of the $(thing)Overworld$() during rainy or snowy weather. It will not attack players unless provoked at which point it attacks in melee, inflicting $(thing)Slowness IV$() on hit. $(mob)Yuki-Onnas$() can spawn equipped with a $(item)Hand Fan$() which increases the knockback of their attacks. $(mob)Yuki-Onnas$() are immune to Fire and falling damage, and can move through cobwebs unimpeded. When reduced to 50% health or lower, a $(mob)Yuki-Onna$() may flee combat entirely. $(mob)Yuki-Onnas$() are vulnerable to warm climates and are inflicted with $(thing)Slowness$() and $(thing)Weakness$() if they enter warm or hot biomes.
$(mob)Yuki-Onnas$() drop $(item)Fur$() on death, which can be smelted in a furnace to create $(item)Leather$().
$(mob)Yuki-Onnas$() rarely drop $(item)Ornate Ice FanS() on death, which is a magical melee weapon bearing the$(thing)Knockback II$() enchantment and can inflict $(thing)Slowness IV$() on hit.
